languages.text: {n}Ваши мысли обращены к Губительным силам, когда вы убиваете пленных одного за другим. Вы беззвучно шепчете слова запретных молитв и чувствуете, что жертва ваша угодна Им. Темное благоволение направляет вашу руку, и чужая боль сладко разливается по венам, пульсирует мощью и жаждой действия. В глазах мертвецов застывает ужас — на пороге гибели они осознали вашу власть и свою ужасную участь.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
получаем бафф LT_Riot_Sacrifice_buff
убиваем пленников, конец диалога

получаем бафф LT_Riot_Sacrifice_buff
убиваем пленников, конец диалога

languages.text: {n}You turn your thoughts to the Ruinous Powers as you kill the prisoners one after the other. As you silently mouth the words of forbidden prayers, you sense that your sacrifice has pleased the gods. A dark blessing guides your hand, and the agony of the butchered courses through your veins, pulsing with strength and an impetus to act. You see horror in the still eyes of the corpses — in their final moments, they fully understood the extent of your power and their own terrible fate.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши мысли обращены к Губительным силам, когда вы убиваете пленных одного за другим. Вы беззвучно шепчете слова запретных молитв и чувствуете, что жертва ваша угодна Им. Темное благоволение направляет вашу руку, и чужая боль сладко разливается по венам, пульсирует мощью и жаждой действия. В глазах мертвецов застывает ужас — на пороге гибели они осознали вашу власть и свою ужасную участь.{/n}

A dark blessing guides your hand, and the agony of the butchered courses through your veins, pulsing with strength and an impetus to act. You see horror in the still eyes of the corpses — in their final moments, they realised the extent of your power and their own terrible fate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du wendest deine Gedanken den Mächten der Zerstörung zu, während du die Gefangenen der Reihe nach tötest. Als du lautlos die Worte verbotener Gebete sprichst, spürst du, dass dein Opfer die Götter erfreut hat. Ein dunkler Segen leitet deine Hand und der Schmerz der Getöteten pulsiert kraftvoll in deinen Venen. Du siehst Entsetzen in den leblosen Augen der Toten ... in ihren letzten Sekunden haben sie das Ausmaß deiner Macht und ihr schreckliches Schicksal erkannt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn your thoughts to the Ruinous Powers as you kill the prisoners one after the other. As you silently mouth the words of forbidden prayers, you sense that your sacrifice has pleased the gods. A dark blessing guides your hand, and the agony of the butchered courses through your veins, pulsing with strength and an impetus to act. You see horror in the still eyes of the corpses — in their final moments, they fully understood the extent of your power and their own terrible fate.{/n}

Ein dunkler Segen leitet deine Hand und der Schmerz der Getöteten pulsiert kraftvoll in deinen Venen. Du siehst Entsetzen in den leblosen Augen der Toten ... in ihren letzten Sekunden haben sie das Ausmaß deiner Macht und ihr schreckliches Schicksal erkannt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tournez votre esprit vers les Puissances de la Ruine tandis que vous tuez les prisonniers l'un après l'autre en formulant silencieusement des prières interdites. Les dieux apprécient votre sacrifice et vous accordent une sombre bénédiction qui guide votre bras. L'agonie des massacrés emplit vos veines d'une force nouvelle et de l'envie d'agir. Les yeux immobiles des cadavres reflètent encore la terreur les ayant saisis dans leurs derniers instants lorsqu'ils ont compris l'étendue de votre pouvoir et le sort terrible qui les attendait.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn your thoughts to the Ruinous Powers as you kill the prisoners one after the other. As you silently mouth the words of forbidden prayers, you sense that your sacrifice has pleased the gods. A dark blessing guides your hand, and the agony of the butchered courses through your veins, pulsing with strength and an impetus to act. You see horror in the still eyes of the corpses — in their final moments, they fully understood the extent of your power and their own terrible fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tournez votre esprit vers les Puissances de la Ruine tandis que vous tuez les prisonniers l'un après l'autre en formulant silencieusement des prières interdites. Les dieux apprécient votre sacrifice et vous accordent une sombre bénédiction qui guide votre bras. L'agonie des massacrés emplit vos veines d'une force nouvelle et de l'envie d'agir. Les yeux immobiles des cadavres reflètent encore la terreur les ayant saisis dans leurs derniers instants lorsqu'ils ont compris l'étendue de votre pouvoir et le sort terrible qui les attendait.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Centras tus pensamientos en los Poderes Ruinosos mientras ejecutas a los prisioneros uno por uno. Mientras tus labios articulan en silencio las palabras de sus plegarias prohibidas, notas que tu sacrificio ha complacido a los dioses. Una bendición oscura guía tu mano, y la agonía de las víctimas masacradas te recorre las venas, infundiéndote un renovado brío y el ímpetu para actuar. Ves el horror en los ojos muertos de los cadáveres; en sus últimos instantes fueron plenamente conscientes del verdadero alcance de tu poder y del terrible destino que les aguardaba.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn your thoughts to the Ruinous Powers as you kill the prisoners one after the other. As you silently mouth the words of forbidden prayers, you sense that your sacrifice has pleased the gods. A dark blessing guides your hand, and the agony of the butchered courses through your veins, pulsing with strength and an impetus to act. You see horror in the still eyes of the corpses — in their final moments, they fully understood the extent of your power and their own terrible fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Centras tus pensamientos en los Poderes Ruinosos mientras ejecutas a los prisioneros uno por uno. Mientras tus labios articulan en silencio las palabras de sus plegarias prohibidas, notas que tu sacrificio ha complacido a los dioses. Una bendición oscura guía tu mano, y la agonía de las víctimas masacradas te recorre las venas, infundiéndote un renovado brío y el ímpetu para actuar. Ves el horror en los ojos muertos de los cadáveres; en sus últimos instantes fueron plenamente conscientes del verdadero alcance de tu poder y del terrible destino que les aguardaba.{/n}

languages.text: {n}囚人たちを一人また一人と殺しつつ、〈禍つ神々〉へと思考を馳せる。禁じられた祈りの言葉を静かに口にしつつ、あなたは生贄が神々を喜ばせているのを感じる。闇の祝福があなたの手を導き、虐殺された者たちの苦しみが血管を流れ、腕力と推進力への原動力が脈打つ。死体の動かぬ目に恐怖を見る。最後の瞬間、彼らはあなたの血からの大きさと、自らを待つ恐ろしい運命を完全に理解したのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn your thoughts to the Ruinous Powers as you kill the prisoners one after the other. As you silently mouth the words of forbidden prayers, you sense that your sacrifice has pleased the gods. A dark blessing guides your hand, and the agony of the butchered courses through your veins, pulsing with strength and an impetus to act. You see horror in the still eyes of the corpses — in their final moments, they fully understood the extent of your power and their own terrible fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人たちを一人また一人と殺しつつ、〈禍つ神々〉へと思考を馳せる。禁じられた祈りの言葉を静かに口にしつつ、あなたは生贄が神々を喜ばせているのを感じる。闇の祝福があなたの手を導き、虐殺された者たちの苦しみが血管を流れ、腕力と推進力への原動力が脈打つ。死体の動かぬ目に恐怖を見る。最後の瞬間、彼らはあなたの血からの大きさと、自らを待つ恐ろしい運命を完全に理解したのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你将思想转向了毁灭之力，将囚犯一个接一个杀死。当你默默颂唱着禁忌的祷词时，你感觉到献上的祭品取悦了黑暗诸神。黑暗的祝福引导着你的手，被屠戮的痛苦在你的鲜血中流淌，让你充满了力量与狂热。你从尸体静滞不动的目光中看到了恐惧。在他们生命的最后时刻，他们充分意识到了你的力量，也意识到了他们恐怖的命运。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn your thoughts to the Ruinous Powers as you kill the prisoners one after the other. As you silently mouth the words of forbidden prayers, you sense that your sacrifice has pleased the gods. A dark blessing guides your hand, and the agony of the butchered courses through your veins, pulsing with strength and an impetus to act. You see horror in the still eyes of the corpses — in their final moments, they fully understood the extent of your power and their own terrible fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你将思想转向了毁灭之力，将囚犯一个接一个杀死。当你默默颂唱着禁忌的祷词时，你感觉到献上的祭品取悦了黑暗诸神。黑暗的祝福引导着你的手，被屠戮的痛苦在你的鲜血中流淌，让你充满了力量与狂热。你从尸体静滞不动的目光中看到了恐惧。在他们生命的最后时刻，他们充分意识到了你的力量，也意识到了他们恐怖的命运。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mahkûmları bir bir öldürürken düşüncelerini Yıkıcı Güçler'e yöneltiyorsun. Yasaklı duaların sözlerini sessizce tekrar ediyor, o sırada kurbanlarının tanrıları memnun ettiğini hissediyorsun. Eline karanlık bir lütuf rehberlik ediyor, katledilenlerin ızdırabı damarlarında geziyor. Kudret ve harekete geçme arzusu kanına hâkim oluyor. Cesetlerin hareketsiz gözlerinde dehşeti görüyorsun. Son anlarında gücünün boyutunu ve feci kaderlerini tümüyle idrak etmişler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You turn your thoughts to the Ruinous Powers as you kill the prisoners one after the other. As you silently mouth the words of forbidden prayers, you sense that your sacrifice has pleased the gods. A dark blessing guides your hand, and the agony of the butchered courses through your veins, pulsing with strength and an impetus to act. You see horror in the still eyes of the corpses — in their final moments, they fully understood the extent of your power and their own terrible fate.{/n}
